metadata.title: CVE-2022-39427 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are Prior to6.1.40. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attackerwith logon to the infrastructure where Oracle VM VirtualBox executes tocompromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. While the vulnerability is in Oracle VMVirtualBox, attacks may significantly impact additional products (scopechange). Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover ofOracle VM VirtualBox. Note: This vulnerability applies to Windows systemsonly. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 8.8 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
